title: Bug 2940: Export Zip - Updating checkboxes should use busy cursor
description: Bug 2940: Updating checkboxes in Export Zip should use a busy cursor. It takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds in my case) to update the checked state of the table. The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be shown.
OB: In the Export Zip feature, when updating the checkboxes to reflect the selected projects and file types, no busy cursor is shown and it takes a long time (approximately 30 seconds) for the checkboxes to update.
EB: The expected behavior is that a busy cursor should be displayed during the update process, providing visual feedback to the user. This will help them understand that the system is processing their request and reduce confusion or frustration caused by the delay in updating the checkboxes.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open a workspace with many projects. 
2. Navigate to the Export Zip feature. 
3. Select all projects. 
4. Choose the desired file types. 
5. Press the OK button to initiate the export process.
